slide_content_0: PICO PARK is also known as Pico Park. This is a multiplayer cooperative action puzzle game that has been popular all over the Internet recently and is loved by players. The game relies on its simple and easy-to-use operation method, novel and unique level design, or Q The cute and cute character image has captured the hearts of a large number of players. So what magic power does it have? Let's follow the editor. The rules in the Pico PARK game are very simple. Players only need to obtain all the keys to achieve their goals, and then they can easily win. Although it sounds very simple, many well-designed trap levels in the game, as well as factors such as non-tacit multiplayer cooperation methods, will cause the game to fail. Therefore, it is urgent for all players to work together and cooperate with each other to easily break through the level successfully.
slide_content_1: 1. Flexible levels. When the player gets the key, opens the door, and all players arrive, the level can be cracked. However, each level requires concerted efforts and mutual cooperation to complete. 2. The battle mode cooperation mode is the main content of this game, but when we complete the cooperation mode with our friends, we might as well try the battle mode to compete with friends. 3. Endless Mode Even if you have completed all 48 levels, you can still play in Endless Mode and cooperate with friends to get high scores. Through continuous cooperation, the score becomes higher and higher. 4. Online mode You can play with people from all over the world through the Internet.
slide_content_2: At the beginning of the game, there is a switch in the front. The function of the switch is to alternately connect the left and right roads. In fact, you can pass the level in fewer steps without touching the switch. First, let the little girl enter the yellow light, and switch to let the ghost reach the other yellow light. At the place, purple light and green fog appeared.
slide_content_3: The first level (1-1) is the easiest as it’s the first stage of the game. You basically need to stack on top of each other to allow the player on top to jump to the other side. After jumping, that player has to press on the button to allow the platform to elongate. This will allow the remaining players to go through. Use the lift to go up to the door.
slide_content_4: For level 1-2, you should push the wall to the left and grab the key first. Then, push the wall to the right. pico park level 1 - hello walkthrough guide Then, the wall (pillar) on the right will fall to the hole and enables you to go through. For the next part, you push the block to the other end. Then, the player on the right has to push the block to the left to allow the others to climb over. Head to the exit together.
slide_content_5: For level 1-3, one player has to use the staircase to go up while the other waits down here.The player above will push the button to allow the player(s) at the bottom to use the platform. Next, the player at the bottom has to push all the boxes on the red buttons. This is to remove the blocks in front of the top player. You can now exit together.
slide_content_6: For level 1-4, use the moving platform to climb up. Some of the players have to use the platform in the middle and it requires a certain number of players to go down. Use the middle platform as a way to hide from the moving pillar. Remember to grab the key at the bottom before leaving the area towards the right.Finally, use the moving platform to go up. You may need to take turns as the platform may not take all the players at one time.
slide_content_7: Level 2-1 is the most direct. All four will be roped in together and you just have to jump over the gaps.To get the key below the platform, one player has to go down and he will be hung up by the rope. The others have to walk above the platform.Head all the way to the end to exit.
slide_content_8: For level 2-2, one has to grab the key at the bottom while others hold him using the rope. Head to the right side and fall down without going into the abyss. The players at the bottom should go to the left to ensure the players falling down will be pulled inside. Then, stack on each other to make it to the door. The last few players will be pulled by the rope up.
slide_content_9: For this level, all of the players stack up above one player. The player at the bottom has to run all the way to the end.On the way there, one player has to jump over the block and get the key, landing back on the stack.Finally, use the platform to go up. Take turns to make it to the exit.
slide_title_10: How to get the jet pack alien suit in Wobbly Life
slide_content_10: How get the jet pack // alien suit? 1) You need to start pizza job after 12am (only this hour) 2)Afrer this job starts w/o timer and UFO will appear. 3)All you have to do just follow the damn UFO and deliver pizza to aliens 4)Once thats been completed you'll unlock the alien outfit that will have the jetpack How to equippe suit? You can equippe suit in in each cupboard marked on the map Congratulations! Now you can fly and be green guy like crazy frog 👽
slide_title_11: How To Get Toxic Waste Car
slide_content_11: The Toxic Waste Car is found in Gooey Louie\'s home inside one of the powerplant\'s chimneys. While the Waste Disposal job is in progress Louie moves to the feeding point at the quarry, revealing a small pile of barrels. Interact with them to unlock it.
slide_content_12: Each part is found in a chest within the Temple Puzzles. The first is in the chest immediately on the left in the room the player enters after the hidden path puzzle. The second is down the left path of the maze in a dead end. The third is the opposite side of the memory pattern puzzle room from which the player enters.
slide_content_13: Take the glowing orb from the Temple Puzzles back out the start and the glowing orb from the Waterfall Puzzles into the Mining job. Behind an ore block down in the tunnels are pedestals to put both orbs. The game remembers when one is placed and when the door opens it remains open. Inside the room is a gravestone that must be put through the processor and carted away before the job timer runs out. This then unlocks the pet for purchase.
slide_content_14: Inside the Mountain Lab while small in the Shrinking Machine Lab find all the missing scientists around the room and the UFO key. Complete the middle table platforming. Zipline from the middle table to the lazer maze table and reach the other side. Complete the plank and nail platforming and reach the computer table. Complete the computer puzzle and ride the robot arm to the where the UFO key is.
